interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2023/02/15
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Chee Keong Cheung'], 'Producers': ['Kevin Eastman', 'Carlos Gallardo', 'Ioanna Karavela', 'Mark Strange', 'Chee Keong Cheung'], 'Starring': ['Oris Erhuero', 'Carlos Gallardo', 'Mark Strange'], 'Studio': ['Epic Pictures']}
Review Text: Really scary horrifying zombie flick, although formulaic of a miliary mission involving soldiers on a mission to get a Dr. who might have the cure. Where have we seen that before? Z-Nation is one. But all modern zombie apocalypse movies involve searching for a cure in addition to running, hiding, screaming and killing zombies. I would have rated it higher except I thought the fight scene between to the two soldiers was a bit predictable and more creativity could have been used to transition the scene to the introduction to the gang who already knew the soldiers were there.
Review Title: Horrifying Zombie Flick
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
